short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helper to find people on Twitter that use Mastodon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a little mastodon icon next to users that mention their mastodon handle in their bio. Simply click the icon to go to their mastodon account.
